Package logic

Class ClientLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.ClientLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AiLogic, NetworkLogic
    public class ClientLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkLogic, AiLogic
    this class is created for every Client, the whole play organization is happening in here.
    Author:
    awesch, sandfisc

      constructor.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addToGamePoints​(int points)
      adds the points to the players score.
      void announceKontra()
      can be called by the inGameController, checks if controller is allowed to announce it.
      void announceRekontra()
      can be called by the inGameController, checks if controller is allowed to announce it.
      int calculateMatador()
      calculates the the Matadors the hand has to be sorted before!
      int calculateMultiplier()
      calculates the multiplier to calculate the value of a suit or grand game.
      int calculatePlayValue()
      calculates the play value with the other methods implemented for the special contracts.
      int calculatePlayValueNull()
      initializes the play value for a null play.
      int calculatePlayValueSuitorGrand()
      calculates the play value for suit or grand plays.
      boolean checkIfAuctionIsOver​(int bet)
      returns true if the auction is over.
      void checkIfAuctionWinner()
      checks if this player is auction winner, sets the declarer and if he is the winner, organizes inGameController communication to take up the skat and set the playSettings.
      static boolean checkIfCardPossible​(Card card, Card firstCard, PlayState playState, Player player)
      its is checked if the card can be played by the player depending on his hand, the first Colour of the trick and the PlayMode.
      static boolean checkIfCardPossibleColour​(Card card, Card firstCard, PlayState playState, Player player)
      submethod of checkIfCardPossible.
      static boolean checkIfCardPossibleGrand​(Card card, Card firstCard, Player player, PlayState playState)
      submethod of checkIfCardPossible.
      static boolean checkIfCardPossibleNull​(Card card, Card firstCard, Player player)
      submethod of checkIfCardPossible.
      boolean checkIfGameOverBierlachs()
      returns true if the game score is over the bierlachs piont limit.
      boolean checkIfItsMyTurnAuction​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if this player is supposed to bet next, by combining the specific methods for the different positions.
      boolean checkIfItsMyTurnAuctionForehand​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if the player is supposed to bet next if he sits forehand.
      boolean checkIfItsMyTurnAuctionMiddlehand​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if the player is supposed to bet next, if he sits middlehand.
      boolean checkIfItsMyTurnAuctionRearHand​(Player player, int bet)
      checks if the player is supposed to bet next, if he sits rearhand.
      boolean checkIfMyTurnTrick​(Player playedLastCard)
      returns true if the played card comes from the player with the position, who plays before this player.
      static boolean checkIfServedColour​(Card servingCard, Card servedCard, PlayState playState)
      checks if the serving card serves the served card --> checks if both are trump/jack or have the same color, returns true if served.
      static boolean checkIfServedGrand​(Card servingCard, Card servedCard)
      checks if the serving card serves the served card --> checks is both are jack or have the same color.
      boolean checkIfTrickIsFull()
      returns true if the currentTrick is full.
      void checkWhatHappensNext​(Player playedLastCard, Card card)
      checks what happens next, by updating the playState, checks if trick/play/game is over and calculates the respective winners, also checks if this player is supposed to play the next card.
      Player copyPlayer​(Player player)
      Get a deep copy of a player instance.

      deals out the cards to every player.

      • checkWhatHappensNext

        public void checkWhatHappensNext​(Player playedLastCard,
                                 Card card)
                          throws LogicException
        checks what happens next, by updating the playState, checks if trick/play/game is over and calculates the respective winners, also checks if this player is supposed to play the next card.
        Parameters:
        playedLastCard - player
        card - he played
        Throws:
        LogicException - if something goes wrong

      • checkIfCardPossible

        public static boolean checkIfCardPossible​(Card card,
                                          Card firstCard,
                                          PlayState playState,
                                          Player player)
                                   throws LogicException
        its is checked if the card can be played by the player depending on his hand, the first Colour of the trick and the PlayMode.
        Parameters:
        card - (the player wants to play)
        firstCard - (the first played card in the current trick)
        Returns:
        if card can be played
        Throws:
        LogicException - if card not allowed to play

                                          Card servedCard,
                                          PlayState playState)

        servedCard - first card of trick
